option.name: notice
option.value:
$file.fileName - $file.className
Created on $today.format("dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss") by $username
Copyright (c) $originalComment.match("Copyright \(c\) (\d+)", 1, "-", "$today.year")$today.year. $username (https://loule.me) & CodingFactory (https://codingfactory.fr) @ All rights reserved.
